  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jalios.jcms.plugin.PluginComponent, com.jalios.jcms.policy.PolicyFilter, com.jalios.jcms.policy.RightPolicyFilter, java.lang.Comparable
    public class CSRightPolicyFilter
extends com.jalios.jcms.policy.BasicRightPolicyFilter
    This PolicyFilter ensures confidentiality in Collaborative Spaces.
    Since:
    csp-3
    Author:
    Olivier Dedieu <olivier.dedieu@jalios.com>, Sylvain DEVAUX <sylvain.devaux@jalios.com>

      Allow a Member to work on CollaborativeSpace Portlet if : the member has CSConstants.ACL_WS_SETTINGS ACL and a custom request attribute is found (see CSManager.EDIT_SETTINGS_REQUEST_FLAG) or, the member has CSConstants.ACL_WS_SERVICES ACL and a custom request attribute is found (see CSManager.EDIT_SERVICES_REQUEST_FLAG)

      • canBeReadBy

        public boolean canBeReadBy​(boolean isAuthorized,
                           com.jalios.jcms.workspace.Workspace ws,
                           com.jalios.jcms.Member mbr)
        Checks if a member can read the specified Workspace.
        Specified by:
        canBeReadBy in interface com.jalios.jcms.policy.RightPolicyFilter
        Overrides:
        canBeReadBy in class com.jalios.jcms.policy.BasicRightPolicyFilter
        Parameters:
        isAuthorized - true if internal JCMS control authorized the member to perform this action
        ws - the Workspace that would be read
        mbr - the Member performing the read operation
        Returns:
        true if the member can read the Workspace, false otherwise
        Since:
        csp-7.5.8 / CSP-824

      • canWorkOn

        public boolean canWorkOn​(boolean isAuthorized,
                         com.jalios.jcms.Publication pub,
                         com.jalios.jcms.Member member)
        Allow a Member to work on CollaborativeSpace Portlet if :
        • the member has CSConstants.ACL_WS_SETTINGS ACL and a custom request attribute is found (see CSManager.EDIT_SETTINGS_REQUEST_FLAG)
        • or, the member has CSConstants.ACL_WS_SERVICES ACL and a custom request attribute is found (see CSManager.EDIT_SERVICES_REQUEST_FLAG)
        Specified by:
        canWorkOn in interface com.jalios.jcms.policy.RightPolicyFilter
        Overrides:
        canWorkOn in class com.jalios.jcms.policy.BasicRightPolicyFilter
        Since:
        csp-4.1
        See Also:
        BasicRightPolicyFilter.canWorkOn(boolean, com.jalios.jcms.Publication, com.jalios.jcms.Member)
